text: Bruce Maitland Godfrey (27 March 1885 – 7 October 1947) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Richmond and Essendon in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1885 births Category:1947 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Richmond Football Club players Category:Essendon Football Club players
title: Bruce Godfrey
